body:
Going forward, I plan to keep the official releases, the master branch
and the most recent stable branch (currently 1.5-stable).  For now,
I also want keep 1.4-stable for transition (that's what I'm currently
running).

When 1.5.0 release and 1.6-stable branch come out, then 1.6 will be
the stable branch, 1.5 will be the transition and I'll delete 1.4-head
and 1.4-rc1 and just leave 1.4.0.
title: libunwind: add 1.4.0 release and 1.5 stable branch
